mapper.select: SELECT T1.ORG_ID AS id, T1.ORG_NAME AS name, 'fasle' as open FROM sys_org T1 WHERE T1.PARENT_ORG_ID = '0'
SELECT T1.ORG_ID AS id, T1.ORG_NAME AS name, 'fasle' as open FROM sys_org T1 WHERE T1.PARENT_ORG_ID = #{id}
SELECT T1.ROLE_ID AS id, T1.ROLE_NAME AS name, 'false' AS open FROM sys_role T1

SELECT T2.BUTTON_ID AS buttonId, T2.BUTTON_NAME AS buttonName, T2.BUTTON_PAGE_ID AS buttonPageId FROM sys_menu T1, sys_function T2, sys_role_function T3 WHERE T1.MENU_ID = T2.BUTTON_3_ID AND T1.MENU_URL = #{menuUrl} AND T3.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} AND T2.BUTTON_ID = T3.BUTTON_ID
